summary: Integration test suite for the Mask2Former segmentation model that validates image preprocessing, checkpoint loading, and inference behavior under various configurations such as halfâ€‘precision, missing heads, universal segmentation head, and loss computation with segmentation maps.
business_intent: Ensure reliable deployment and continuous integration of the Mask2Former model by automatically detecting regressions in preprocessing, checkpoint handling, and inference across different precision and architecture variants, supporting product quality and maintenance.
